name: Dr. Sarah Johnson
title: Full-Stack Developer & Tech Educator
bio: Dr. Sarah Johnson is a passionate educator with over 15 years of experience in web development and computer science. She has worked with major tech companies and has taught over 500,000 students worldwide.

name: Alex Chen
title: Senior Software Engineer & Instructor
bio: Alex has built production systems at scale and loves teaching practical skills. Focus on clean code and real-world projects.

name: Maria Garcia
title: Data Scientist & ML Educator
bio: Maria specializes in data analysis and machine learning. Former research lead with a passion for making complex topics accessible.

name: James Wilson
title: Design Lead & UX Instructor
bio: James has led design teams at startups and enterprises. Expert in UI/UX, design systems, and user research.
